All ABOUT LUKE

Luke Severeid is a life long Washington resident and he has the beard and plaids to prove it. He’s performed all over the west coast regaling crowds with tales of idiocy, stupidity and other synonyms of situations that he and his big dumb hairy face have gotten into.

He is loud. He looks meaner than he is. He cuts his own hair. Or at least what’s left of it. He hopes you like him.
